<RESUME_START>
DIGITAL STRATEGY MANAGER
Professional Profile
Results-oriented Digital Strategist  with  experience  creating strategic alliances between internal and external stakeholders to effectively align with, and support key digital business initiatives.
Visionary and strategic thinker with solid experience managing all levels of multiple projects including budgeting and planning.
Qualifications
User-centered design  Project management Paid search Search engine optimization
Social media marketing  Website measurement and analysis Strong communication skills Critical thinking
Relevant Experience
Leadership:  Served as key contributing member to Senior Leadership team.
Design & Strategy:  Implemented digital strategy by managing the design, development, and content curation for a digital library branch to expand the services offered to patrons.
User Experience & Content Quality:  Rolled out website governance guiding the management of digital assets.
Research & Insights:  Created website and mobile app analytics dashboard to measure traffic and usage, and assess areas for improvement.
Online Marketing:  Managed ad spend of over $200k to consistently increase click through rates and online sales.
Project Management:  Managed project goals, timeline, tasks, and budget to launch 3 website redesigns, 1 new website, and a mobile iOS application in a span of 18 months.

EXPERIENCE

Company Name
City ,
State
Digital Strategy Manager

01/2015 to Current
Accountable for the Library system's digital strategy and digital assets including overseeing the management of 7 websites and an iOS mobile application.
Managed team of 2 of web professionals and multiple interdepartmental teams of Librarians, administrators, and Executive Leadership.
Worked collaboratively with vendors to keep projects on task, on time, and under budget.
Spearheaded cross-functional project to achieve a 12% decrease in website bounce rate and an 18% increase in engaged website visits.
Strengthened organization brand by leading a project to develop a custom iOS mobile application integrating with internal systems and a responsive website.
Directed the strategic initiative to launch the new summer program website including management of design creatives, user experience, testing and content curation.
Served as mentor to junior team members.

Managed team of 4 Webmasters and 44 content contributors across the organization.
Defined strategy and key performance indicators for public facing and internal websites.
Directed strategic initiatives to achieve and enforce website standards and governance model.
Identified strategic digital goals and measured performance against targets.
Built financial model for new business unit, including the management of a $450k yearly budget.
Served on the City/County Web Governance Board, Public Information Senior Leadership team, and Extended Information Services and Technology Senior Leadership team.

City ,

Web Metrics Analyst

02/2008 to 10/2011
Developed metrics used to determine inefficiencies and areas for improvement across 65 business units within the Global Small and Medium Business division.  Tracked, analyzed and interpreted trends in website usage and engagement data.
Conducted analysis of business unit website and social media traffic data, to make design and marketing recommendations based on findings.
Drafted monthly lead and revenue reports and forecasts.
Conducted root cause analysis and presented findings and recommendations to executives and other stakeholders.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement a migration from the Surfaid Analytics tool to the Unica NetInsight Analytics platform.

Website Administrator

07/2006 to 02/2008
Updated and managed existing website properties.
Translated abstract requirements into concrete user workflows and interactive designs.
Drove the alignment of business requirements, user-centered design methodology and technology factors to create successful UX designs.
Solicited feedback and validation from business and technical team stakeholders.
Conducted in-person and online user trainings to assist employees and external committee members with managing community content.
Designed and delivered mission critical change request tool using Microsoft SharePoint to ensure the highest levels of availability and performance.
Company Name
City ,

Internet Marketing Manager

12/2005 to 07/2006
Developed website content, meta descriptions and page titles in support of SEO strategies.
Directed comprehensive PPC campaigns for external clients in order to increase brand awareness and boost rates of organic and paid click-through.
Planned and managed ad spend budgets in excess of $200k.
Analyzed performance of all marketing programs to identify the best opportunities for optimization.
Completed strategic competitive analysis by assessing strengths and weaknesses of competitors.
Created usability reports outlining the pitfalls that contribute to decreased leads and conversions.
Designed wireframes identifying recommendations for website improvement.
Conducted root cause analysis on isolated issues and presented findings to clients and other stakeholders.

<JD_START>
Job Title: Digital Analyst (Google Analytics)

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Job Title: Digital Analytics Specialist
Location: Weehawken, NJ
Company: Advaana Inc.
About Advaana Inc.
Advaana Inc., a premier Digital Analytics consulting firm, stands as a martech ally for agencies and marketing teams. We excel in Google Analytics 4, mParticle, Firebase, Branch/Braze, among other technologies, driving optimization in digital marketing strategies through superior analytics implementations. Our proficiency extends to Google Tag Manager, Adobe Analytics, Adobe Experience Platform, Looker Studio, Tableau, Power BI, and cloud technologies including AWS, GCP, and Azure.
Position Overview:
Advaana Inc. is on the lookout for a skilled Digital Analytics Specialist for our NJ location. This pivotal role is designed for individuals eager to push the boundaries of digital marketing through insightful data analysis and technological integrations. The ideal candidate will be deeply versed in Google Analytics 4, supplemented by familiarity with mParticle, Firebase, and Branch/Braze.
Responsibilities:
- Mastery of Google Analytics 4 is essential, with valuable knowledge in mParticle, Firebase, Branch/Braze. Applicants should be proficient in tagging and ready to engage in design and architecture discussions.- Identify and integrate the optimal marketing automation software and technological solutions into clients' frameworks, ensuring alignment with their strategic objectives.- Utilize robust problem-solving capabilities to decipher metrics such as conversion rates, cost-per-lead, and click-through rates, extracting insights for progressive enhancements.- Play an instrumental role in refining marketing campaigns, elevating customer engagement, and bolstering overall business metrics through detailed data analysis and the strategic use of marketing technology tools.- Collaborate intimately with marketing teams, digital marketing professionals, data analysts, and developers to uncover opportunities, evaluate performance, and devise strategies for marketing optimization.- Engage in rigorous data analysis and reporting, adeptly employing marketing technology tools like Braze, mParticle, Branch, Snowflake, Google Analytics, and Google Tag Management for strategic decision-making.- Design, execute, and analyze A/B or multivariate tests, reporting on outcomes to guide marketing tactics.- Gather, track, and scrutinize data via KPIs such as click-through rate, conversion rate, and cost-per-lead, proposing methods to amplify customer acquisition, demand generation, and revenue.- Demonstrate intermediate expertise in new technology solutions, including project management software, digital advertising platforms, and database management and analytics.
Qualifications:
- Proficient in Google Analytics 4, with a keen understanding of mParticle, Firebase, Branch/Braze.- Hands-on experience with tagging, data analysis, and the application of marketing technology tools.- Strong analytical skills with the capacity to interpret complex data for business insights.- Collaborative spirit, able to work across teams and with client stakeholders.- Knowledge in conducting A/B testing, multivariate testing, and proficiency in reporting.- Intermediate level skills in project management software, digital advertising platforms, and database management and analytics.
Why Join Us?
Advaana Inc. offers a stimulating environment where innovation and growth are not just encouraged but are part of our DNA. Being at the forefront of digital analytics and marketing technology, we provide a collaborative culture where your contributions will have a direct impact on our success and that of our clients. If you are passionate about leveraging data to drive marketing success, your place is here with us.
Apply Now
Step into the future of digital marketing analytics with Advaana Inc. Submit your application today through LinkedIn or visit our website.
---
Advaana Inc. is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.

Experience Level (if available): None
<JD_END>
